name: CockBlock Hero
description:
** DEFAULT CONTROLS:

ARROW KEYS: move

WASD: directional lazerz

Q: punch

E: flying leap

** GAMEPAD RECOMMENDED CONTROLS:

DPAD: move

FACE BUTTONS: directional lazerz

R1: punch

R2: flying leap

** INSTRUCTIONS:

use your powers to defend your friend as long as possible.

primary attack: lazer gaze of stone will defeat the common goat, however rhinos are immune.

secondary attack: a forceful punch with a large range of effectiveness can clear out a small group, it also leeches the life force of its victims to power your flying leap. it does take a brief moment to recharge so utilize it wisely.

tertiary attack: channeling the souls of your defeated foes you launch yourself forward, destroying anything in your path. useful for covering large distances or clearing large crowds.
